Truthtagging ttbar

Dec 22, 2017

Purpose

  • large stat. error contribution from ttbar bc
  • apply truth tagging to ttbar events with c-labelled jets

  • same procedure as V+jets

  • apply rebinning transformation (same bins as inclusive bkg) )

    Results

    )

    2 jets

    )

3 jets
